https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lOSmCfNnJOcM6BYnTB16OnJAhcP.jpg An inspiring feature documentary and love story, about the overnight sensation, actor and international sex symbol, Andy Whitfield, who put the same determination and dedication that he brought to his lead role in "Spartacus" into fighting life-threatening cancer. Be Here Now
